product_name: Garmin TOPO Alaska Enhanced microSD Data Card
long_description: The Garmin TOPO Alaska Enhanced microSD data card serves up detailed 24K and 63K topographic maps on compatible GPS units for all your Alaskan adventures. 1:24,000 scale city coverage of Anchorage, Juneau and Fairbanks; all other areas in Alaska are covered by 1:63,360 scale. Map features trails, terrain contours, elevation, summits, parks, rivers, lakes, geographic points, parks and forests. Also features recreational and wildlife areas, range and section information and BLM townships. Routable roads let you follow accurate directions to your destination. Searchable points of interest include place names, campgrounds and businesses. 3D terrain shading and digital elevation model shaded relief help you estimate terrain difficulty. The Garmin TOPO Alaska Enhanced microSD data card comes with an SD card adapter. Note: Maps on microSD and SD cards cannot be copied or viewed on a computer.
short_description: The Garmin TOPO Alaska Enhanced microSD data card serves up detailed 24K and 63K topographic maps on compatible GPS units for all your Alaskan adventures.
